announcements: Ladies and Gentlemen may have a private Performance on reasonable terms, at their own Residences, on application to T. Garbut, at the above Place of Performance; and if the Performance is not approved of, no money will be required.

T Garbut is sorry to find, that the Inhabitants of the Place have been of late imposed on my mere pretenders to the powers of Ventriloquism; begs leave to hope that his right to assume this appellation of a Ventriloquist, will be acknowledged by those Ladies and Gentlemen that may honor him with their company, to be the greatest curiosity ever witnessed: indeed, if his performance is not approved of the money will be returned at the door; or any party of Ladies and Gentlemen may go in, and pay as they come out.

shows.venue: The Durham Ox, Pelham Street, Nottingham
featuredAttractionsForShow: Part II. Force of Hercules, with Ground and Lofty Tumbling, by Master Garbut, the first Performer in this Kingdom
Part III. Thaumatactics; or, The Wonderful Conjurer!
notes: Descriptions for each part's attractions are available on the playbill.
